SEARCH
Package managers

Class InventoryManager

java.lang.Object
managers.InventoryManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
Manager
public class InventoryManager extends Object implements Manager
Manages the inventory of medications by performing various operations such as adding, removing, updating, and viewing medications. It also handles replenishment requests and tracks low stock alerts.
Since:
2024-11-21

    • InventoryManager

      public InventoryManager(String csvFilePath)
      Constructs an instance of InventoryManager and initializes the list of medications by loading data from the CSV file.

  • Method Details

    • getLastRequestID

      public static int getLastRequestID()
      Gets the ID of the last replenishment request.
      Returns:
      the last replenishment request ID

    • setLastRequestID

      public static void setLastRequestID(int ID)
      Sets the ID of the last replenishment request.
      Parameters:
      ID - the new last request ID

    • initialise

      public void initialise()
      Initializes the inventory by loading medication data from the CSV file. If the file is missing or empty, a message is displayed.
      Specified by:
      initialise in interface Manager

    • getMedication

      public Medication getMedication(String medicationName)
      Retrieves a medication by its name from the inventory.
      Parameters:
      medicationName - the name of the medication
      Returns:
      the Medication object if found, otherwise null

    • getInventory

      public List<Medication> getInventory()
      Retrieves the entire inventory of medications.
      Returns:
      a list of Medication objects

    • viewInventory

      public void viewInventory()
      Displays the inventory of medications, including stock levels and low stock alerts.

    • addNewMedication

      public void addNewMedication(String medName, int stock, int lowStockValue)
      Adds a new medication to the inventory.
      Parameters:
      medName - the name of the medication
      stock - the initial stock level
      lowStockValue - the threshold for triggering low stock alerts

    • removeMedication

      public void removeMedication(String medName)
      Removes a medication from the inventory by its name.
      Parameters:
      medName - the name of the medication to remove

    • updateMedication

      public boolean updateMedication(String medicationName, int amount, boolean add_or_remove)
      Updates the stock level of a medication in the inventory.
      Parameters:
      medicationName - the name of the medication
      amount - the amount to add or remove
      add_or_remove - true to add stock, false to remove stock
      Returns:
      true if the stock was successfully updated, otherwise false

    • updateAllAlertLevels

      public List<Medication> updateAllAlertLevels()
      Updates low stock alerts for all medications in the inventory.
      Returns:
      a list of medications that are low in stock

    • checkReplenishRequestExists

      public boolean checkReplenishRequestExists(String medicationName)
      Checks if a replenishment request exists for a specific medication.
      Parameters:
      medicationName - the name of the medication
      Returns:
      true if a pending replenishment request exists, otherwise false

    • submitReplenishRequest

      public void submitReplenishRequest(String medicationName, int amount)
      Submits a replenishment request for a medication.
      Parameters:
      medicationName - the name of the medication
      amount - the quantity to replenish
